name: Find and Help
description:
Find and Help

Game story:

Everything starts in the forest where you meet a perfect creature called "Purple". The main thing is that he got lost and he needs to find his family. To help him or not - it's only your decision. Be ready for quests and riddles that you will meet on your own path. You can click on "Purple" to get tips! Don't forget to have fun and to stay relaxed!

Controls: 

Walking: WASD

Jumping: Space

Crouching: Ctrl

Sprint: Shift

Camera and Interaction: Mouse

Credits:

Programming/Art: Nikolai Egorov

Music/SFX: Artyom Kolenkov

(Special thanks to AL|EN)
